mapper.select: select a.sideDName, b.foodGName, c.cookMName , a.sideDCode, a.sideDImg from sideDish a join foodGroup b join cookMethod c where a.foodGCode = b.foodGCode and a.cookMCode = c.cookMCode and a.sideDName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
select * from foodmaterial where foodMName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into sidedinfo(sideDCode, foodMCode, foodMAmount) values ((select MAX(sideDCode) from sidedish),#{foodMCode},#{foodMAmount})
insert into sidedish(foodGCode, cookMCode, sideDName, recipe, sideDImg) values (#{foodGCode},#{cookMCode},#{sideDName},#{recipe},#{sideDImg})
insert into diet(diseaseCode, wizardCode, dietName, price, dietImg, spDietItem) values (#{diseaseCode},#{wizardCode},#{dietName},#{price},#{dietImg},#{spDietItem})
insert into dietinfo(dietCode, sideDCode) values ((select MAX(dietCode) from diet),#{sideDCode})
mapper.select: select a.sideDCode,a.foodMCode, a.foodMAmount, sum(b.kcal) as kcal, c.sideDName from sidedinfo a join foodmaterial b join sidedish c where a.foodMCode = b.foodMCode and a.sideDCode = c.sideDCode group by a.sideDCode having a.sideDCode = #{sideDCode}
select s.sideDCode,s.sideDName,s.sideDImg from sidedish s,(select i.sideDcode from diet d, dietInfo i where d.dietCode=1 and d.dietCode=i.dietCode) b where s.sideDcode = b.sideDCode;
